name: Wreck at Delta Blue
description:
In Wreck at Delta Blue, you must investigate a wreckage outside the giant blue gas giant, fabled by many as a place of bad luck. Collect samples (glowing blue objects), and avoid crashing into asteroids and junk!

This game is an entry to Ludem Dare 50, my first Ludem Dare (not my first game jam though). My project can be found here.

Controls:

WS / Flight stick Up/Down  - Pitch

QE / Flight stick Twist - Yaw

AD / Flight stick Left/Right - Roll

Arrow Keys / Flight stick analog - Look Around

Shift & Control / Flight stick speed setting - Flight Speed

If you see a "TURN BACK" text on the right side panel, you must try to fly back to where the asteroids are. Despite the title, you don't actually enter Delta Blue, but rather you are flying near it.

The game was made using Godot 4 Alpha 5, so expect many bugs! For example, there is was a bug involving the renderer, causing harmful flashing blue lights. This is fixed in Version 1.1. Please play that version instead.

There are also features that I would have liked to add, but ran out of time to do. Oooops...
